participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Caring and hardworking, Jake is passionate about construction and has a deep affection for his pets.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Marlene
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, Marlene loves spending time outdoors and enjoys the thrill of gambling.
participant_2.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

content.text: yes   i have a brother   i live with him   my dad   and cat   you
